product_name: LancomeAdvanced Genifique Eye Light Pearl De-puffing Eye Serum
summary: SummaryLancôme Advanced Génifique Eye Light Pearl De-puffing Eye Serum reduces the appearance of under eye bags and puffiness while fortifying lashes to leave eyes looking less tired and reawakened.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates and Brightens: Adds moisture for refreshed, glowy, youthful-looking eyes.De-Puffing Action: A cooling applicator instantly cools skin by -5 degrees F* to reduce under-eye puffiness, leaving eyes looking well-rested and energized.Reduces Wrinkles and Fine Lines: Diminishes the appearance of under-eye wrinkles and fine lines over time.Boosts Lash Vitality: Applying excess serum to the lash line improves lash vitality for beautiful, silky lashes.Tightens and Lifts: Hydrates the under-eye area, leaving skin feeling tightened and lifted.This product is safe for sensitive eyes and dermatologically tested. It is allergy tested under ophthalmological and dermatological control.Key IngredientsBifidus Prebiotic: Supports a favorable environment for good bacteria on the skin's surface.Caffeine: Helps reduce the look of puffiness.Arginine: An amino acid that firms and smooths.Free From: Sulfates, mineral oil, phthalates, sulfates SLS & SLES.*Product benefits are based on product formula testing, not on the individual ingredients.Research ResultsClinical Results:Immediate*:Reduces the appearance of under-eye wrinkles, fine lines, crow's feet, and bags under the eyes.After 4+ Weeks**:Reduces Under-Eye Bags: Clinically tested to reduce the appearance of under-eye bags by -17.4% in just 6 weeks.Firms and Smooths Fine Lines: Reduces the appearance of under-eye wrinkles by -33.1% and fine lines around the eye by -32.7%.**Clinical grading, results after 4-6 weeks of use, 50-52 womenItem 2288937How To UseSwirl the serum applicator along the bottle neck to remove any excess product before applying.Sweep back and forth around your eye contour using the flexible massage applicator.Massage with small circular movements using the applicator.Apply applicator along lash line for lash benefits.TIPS: Store in the refrigerator for an even cooler eye serum applicator.This product is safe for sensitive eyes and dermatologically tested. It is allergy tested under ophthalmological and dermatological control.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat, Dimethicone, Methyl Gluceth-20, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, T-Butyl Alcohol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Mica, Escin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lactic Acid, Lactobacillus, Madecassoside, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Adenosine, Faex Extract / Yeast Extract / Extrait De Levure, Acetic Acid, Caffeine, Arginine, Chlorphenesin, Polyacrylamide, Cellulose, Silica, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Maltodextrin, Salicyloyl Phytosphingosine, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer , Dimethiconol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Mannose, Xanthan Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl, Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Capryly Glycol, Caprylic/ Capric Triglyceride, Bis-PEG/PPG-16/16 PEG/PPG-16/16 Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Aluminum, Starch Octenylsuccinate, Laureth-7, C13-14, Isoparaffin. (F.I.L. : N283738/1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swirl the serum applicator along the bottle neck to remove any excess product before applying.Sweep back and forth around your eye contour using the flexible massage applicator.Massage with small circular movements using the applicator.Apply applicator along lash line for lash benefits.TIPS: Store in the refrigerator for an even cooler eye serum applicator.This product is safe for sensitive eyes and dermatologically tested. It is allergy tested under ophthalmological and dermatological control.
ingredients: Faex Extract / Yeast Extract / Extrait De Levure

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product
reviews.comments: Very refreshing but be careful of getting in your eyes.  Really stings.

reviews.headline: No improvement; pills around the eyes
reviews.comments: I've only been using it for about a month, and haven't noticed any change to my dark circles and bags.  Also, once it dries, it "pills" horribly.  If you use it along the lash line as it recommends, the pilling gets in your eyes and it's very irritating.  And also, because of the pilling, you can't wear it under makeup. I will not be buying this again.

reviews.headline: Absolute favorite lash enhancer/ depuffer combo
reviews.comments: This is my second bottle and i always make it stretch because i love how much it makes my lashes grow. I think my puffiness is genetic so what can ya do. Only reason we have to part ways is due to the Price.

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: No results. It doesn't do anything to your eyes. Before my purchase, I read the positive comments only, really hoping that was going to be my experience. I should've noticed that there were several negative comments too. Don't waste your money. Not worth it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I have only used it for a few day now but it seems to be working .

reviews.headline: Game changer!
reviews.comments: This was a game changer for my aging 57 year old eyes. I keep it in the refrigerator. Each night before bed I massage the cold stainless steal with the serum under my eyes and on my eye lids. The results started to show the first morning. My eyes were visibly brighter, less puffy, less wrinkles, and appeared less sunken in. I did not have any irritation in or around my eyes. I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Unsanitary applicator
reviews.comments: I used this product for three months. It was going great, until I woke up one day with a STYE. The small glands that line my waterline got plugged. I know it was the product because I tried to use it a couple months after my stye cleared. I ended up with a stye again. I just think that even when using the applicator on clean hands, then applying it to under eyes; still makes it unsanitary. Plus the price makes this product not worth it.

reviews.headline: Does what it claims
reviews.comments: One week morning and night-the puffiness is reduced  to a minimum with my morning ritual taking it away for the day. Lines are invisible in the mornings and  at night time to reapply.

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for about 8 months now and the area around my eyes has become smooth and my concealer goes on perfect!

reviews.headline: Save your money
reviews.comments: I was excited to get this. Considering its Lancome and the price, I expected results. Ive been using it for nearly 8 weeks. Its done absolutely nothing, but in fact, my eyes have a darker hue now.

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: obsessed!! Especially, when my eyes are puffy and dryer than usual. highly recommend

reviews.headline: Skin Care Lancome
reviews.comments: wonderful product to work with

reviews.headline: No more purple under eyes!!
reviews.comments: I cant speak much for the effectivness of the depuffing, i do not typically struggle with puffiness, however i do struggle with dark circles and can say this dramatically brightens the undereye area overnight for me, and the skin around my eyes looks much smoother and less creasey! Ive also noticed my lashes looking a bit longer! Application is so soothing and cooling for tired eyes.

reviews.headline: Buuurrrrrnnnssss
reviews.comments: Like many others, thus irritated my eyes terribly! Burning and stinging… it was so expensive and i have to trash it. Trying to figure out what ingredient is causing the reaction

reviews.headline: I hate it ! It burned my skin under my eyes
reviews.comments: This gave me burned skin !  My under eyes started to peel because of the burned it caused my skin !

reviews.headline: love this brand!
reviews.comments: can't go wrong with this brand, always can tell a difference

reviews.headline: Irritates eyes
reviews.comments: Irritates my eyes

reviews.headline: eye serum
reviews.comments: best eye serum. reduced my Puffiness from my eyes also has helped my eyelashes grow long and beautiful.. after applying this serum I apply renergie eye cream.  I use in my morning and night skin care routine.

reviews.headline: First time user.  Good so far.
reviews.comments: I have very thin and sensitive skin.  So I am very picky about skiun products.  So far,so good.

reviews.headline: Price Increase Same Size
reviews.comments: Feels amazing after removing false lashes (& cleansing face) one reason I tried this product I enjoy using this on my top and bottom lashes for extra growth as well as using it for my under eyes the metal applicator lasted a really long time would love to always keep this in my skincare collection

media.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
media.caption: Age is just a number!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have horrible dark circles and have never found a product that actually takes the darkness away without just covering it. This product does it! It isn't an instant fix, but it does work over a couple of weeks. It works more quickly at reducing puffiness - usually in an hour or so. I'm going to be 40 this year so I was interested in preventing any crowsfeet that may be creeping up on me as well. Since I didn't have any to start with and I don't have any now, I couldn't say if the product helped there. I do have the worry lines between my eyebrows and though I can still see them, during my most stressful times at work, the lines don't appear to be aggrivated (like I get!#. The product doesn't have any particular smell #I like scented products) and it is very light. It is not oily at all. It takes a bit to soak in so its not like an under eye cream where you just rub it in and then put on your moisturizer and makeup. You need to give it 2-3 minutes to absorb so I'd make it the first part of your routine after you wash your face. I'm online here to buy a second bottle. This has become an essential part of my skin care routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally, a product that actually works on my dark circles!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using Lancome products for many years. This eye serum I tried did nothing for me. Did not improve bags in AM or darkness at all. There is nothing good I can say about it. The best eye cream I have used was Lancome's Absolue Precious Cells. That is the only one that significantly improved the whole eye area in every way. It is too expensive for me to use on a regular basis. If I am lucky to get it in a gift, I will use it exclusively. For now I use the Absolue eye cream which is in gift when I make a purchase often enough to last me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Did nothing for me
